string-array.name: hymn_content
string-array.item:
1.Hatina musha panyika
 " "Hatifari kuva pano
 " "Zvinofadza mweya yedu
 " "Kutsvaga musha unouya
 " "Kutsvaga musha unouya
 

2. Hatina musha panyika
 " "Tinoda musha uri kure
 " "Zita rawo iZion
 " "Unopenya nguva dzose
 " "Unopenya nguva dzose
 

3. Musha une runyararo
 " "Vafambi vachazorora
 " "Dai ndine mapapiro
 " "Ndaiuya ndizorore
 " "Ndaiuya ndizorore
 

4. Mweya wangu chinyarara
 " "Mwari anoziva nguva
 " "Achaita kuda kwake
 " "Iye wandopa zororo
 " "Iye wandopa zororo

1.Would you be free from your burden of sin
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Would you o'er evil a victory to win
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

Chorus
 " "There is power, wonder working power
 " "In the blood of the lamb, there is power,power 
 " "Wonder working power in the precious blood of the lamb
 

2. Would you be free from your pasiion and pride
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

3. Would you be whiter, much whiter than the snow
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Sin stains are in its life giving flow
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

4. Would you do service for Jesus your king
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Would you live daily, His praises to sing
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood

1.Sewakhile enhlizi 'weni,
 " "Umhlobo'wam'
 " "Nguy'omkhul' ezihlotsheni
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Ngoba nguy' owangimela,
 " "La ngilahlwe ngokwempela
 " "Ngal'uthando wangifela,
 " "Lomhlobo wam'
 

2. Wabe kad' engithandile'
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Ngisenguye omdelile
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Nxa ukuona kwami kwanda
 " "Weza wena wanginqanda,
 " "Ngisemubi wangithanda
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 

3. Wazisus izono zami
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Naz' izinyembezi zami,
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Nxa ngiduka endleleni
 " "Unyenyeza enhlizi' weni
 " "Ungivusa emoyeni
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 

4. Uyathwai' umthwalo wam',
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Uthi, wongithwala wami
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Wayehlatswa njengemvana
 " "Az 'angenz owakh' uMntwana
 " "Yek' inhlanhla yokwazana
 " "Nomhlobo wam'
 
 5. Bonkie-ke bangamfumana
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Unomusa, uyaphana
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Yonk' eminye imihlobo
 " "Ingadinwa yen'uqobo
 " "Nguye namhla njengezolo
 " "Nomhlobo wam'

1.Thatha konke, ngino Jesu
 " "Konke' okuny' indiva nje
 " "Kodw uthando lwakhe lumi,
 " "Zolo namhla, njalo, he
 

Chorus
 " "Yek' ubuhle bokumazi
 " "Umsindisi wethu lo,
 " "Yen' othando Iwakhe lumi,
 " "Zolo, namhla, njalo, bo
 

2.Thatha konke, ngino Jesu
 " "Ngukuphila kwami la,
 " "Nxa ekhon'uJesu wami
 " "Angisweli lutho, qha.
 

3.Thatha konke, ngino Jesu
 " "Unganele mina la,
 " "Nxa nginaye la empini,
 " "Ngokunqoba konke nya.
 

4.Thatha konke, nginojesu,
 " "Engimethembayo, he!
 " "Masinyane wongibiza,
 " "Ngiyohlala naye le.

1.Tsitsi dzinondishamisa
 " "Dzakandiponesa
 " "Ndakanga ndisingaone
 " "Zvino ndaoneswa


2.Tsitsi dzinondishamisa
 " "Dzakandishingisa
 " "Ngetsitsi dzake ndasukwa


3. Mudambudzo repanyika
 " "Ndinemugondeki
 " "Ndichazofamba kuenda
 " "Kum'soro kudenga.


4.Ishe wakanditsidzira
 " "Rufaro kudenga
 " "Jehova ndiye muchengeti
 " "Muupenyu hwapasi

1.Wen'ondinda kude.
 " "phandle kwesibaya,
 " "Yizwe izwi lithi
 " "Buyel ekhaya


Chorus
 " "Buya mntwana, buya
 " "Ubeyel' ekhaya
 " "Mus'ukuli bala,
 " "Buyel' ekhaya


2.Izwe osukulo, linendler enkulu
 " "Woza ekundleni kwombus wezulu


3.Shiy' indlela embi,
 " "ephambukisayo
 " "Kuyo unosizi oluhlabayo


4. Wena usathadwa,
 " "uhlalew'ekhaya
 " "Sebekubhekile, abalaphaya

1.Igama leNkosi liyiyo inqaba,
 " "Ophephela khona uyakusindiswa
 " "Ohlezi kuyona akanakwesaba,
 " "Ngokuba umhlaba
 " "uzanyazanyiswa


2 Abayokhulek'egameni leNkosi
 " "Bayakusindiswa, uyasho umbhalo
 " "Libongwe abantu, libongw ing'losi
 " "Alikho igama elihle njengalo


3.Igama lenkosi linika amandla
 " "Liyawaqinisa amadolo ethu,
 " "Lisusa uvalo, linika unhlanhla
 " "Liyasikhanyisa endleleni yethu


4.Mhla ngiyakumuka,
 " "ngishiye lo'mhlaba
 " "Igama leNkosi lithikithi lami
 " "Khona ngiyohamba
 " "gingenakwesaba,
 " "Ngocasha kuJesu,
 " "enguMhlengi wami

1.Siyakunxusa, Nkosi yethu,
 " "Thum'umlilo umlilo
 oNgcwele
 " "Selupholil' uthando wethu
 " "Thum'umlilo umlilo oNgcwele
 " "Sibhek' iPentekost impela
 " "Nxa lowomlilo usehlela
 " "Nguwena, Nkosi wosizwela,
 " "Thum'umlilo umlilo oNgcwele!


2.O. Thixo kaElija sizwe
 " "Thum'umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele
 " "Izinhliziyo mazivuswe.
 " "Thum' umiilo umlilo oNgewele
 " "Siyazibeka elathini
 " "Sibhek'umlilo ezulwini.
 " "Sihlanjululwe ebubini,
 Thum'umlilo umlilo Ongcwele


3.Uthinte izindebe zethu
 " "Ngal'ilahle lomlilo oNgcwele,
 " "Ihlanjululw' imlomo yethu,
 " "Thum'umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele
 " "Sibe izigijima zakho
 " "Zokuhambis'indaba yakho
 " "Siholwe njalo ngezwi lakho
 " "Thum'mlilo umlilo oNgcwele


4.Ushilo nezwi lingephuthe
 " "Ngizophonsa Umlil' enhlabeni
 " "Sengathi lowomlil'uhuthe
 " "Thum'umlilo umlilo oNgcwele
 " "Sivuselelwe emoyeni
 " "Sipheleliswe othandweni,
 " "Luvhute, njalo ebandleni
 " "Thumulilo umlilo oNcgwele

1.Limnandi kimi lelogam,
 " "Nguyen'owangifela nam'
 " "Ligcwele enhliz'weni yam'
 " "Igama lika jesu


Chorus
 " ""UJesu" alimnandi pho
 " ""UJesu" limi njalo bo
 " ""UJesu" ngiza kulisho
 " "Namanje naphakade
 

2."UJesu", elomfeli wam'
 " "Owazithwal'izono zam'
 " "Oseqedil'uyalo lwam'
 " "Ngiyamuthanda uJesu
 

3.Ingekhathal'indlebe,qha,
 " "Ilizwa lelogama la,
 " "Liqed' izinyembezi nya.
 " "EloMsindisi' uJesu
 " "4.Alikho nelilodwa, qha,
 " "Ezweni noma laphaya,
 " "Singelibonge sonke na
 " "Elihle likaJesu

1.Hama yedu ndisheJesu,
 " "Unotibetsera sei!
 " "Nhamo yedu misi yose
 " "Kuna iye tiisei!
 " "Tinoshaiwa zvomufaro.
 " "Tinosinzwe shunguwo
 " "Kana tisingasiendi
 " "Kundoudza Ishe 
 

2.Musi watinoidziwa,
 " "Nyange totambura sei,
 " "Tirege kurasha moyo,
 " "Kunashe titizire
 " "Kunomumwe ungasenga
 " "Nhamo dzedu idzedzo?
 " "Asi iye unoziva
 " "Tinoudza she Jesu
 

3.Nguva yatinoremedzwa,
 " "Tichishaiwa simbawo,
 " "Jesu ndiye nhare yedu
 " "Titizire ipapo
 " "Kana tichisi'wa toga,
 " "Tindoudza Jesuwo
 " "Mumaoko ake ose
 " "Tichandonyaradzwamo

1.Thina sihlengiwe,Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Yebo sihlengiwe, Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Lona lasophela, lapho esifela,
 " "Lasithethelela, Igazi lika Jesu
 

2.Likuthula kwethu,Igazi lika Jesu,
 " "Nenjabulo yethu,lgazi lika Jesu
 " "Amacala onke, Naz'izono zonke,
 " "Kupheliswa konke, Igazi lika Jesu
 

3.Likuphila kwethu, Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Liyithemba lethu, Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Lapha emhlabeni, Nxa sisekulweni.
 " "Noma ekufeni, Igazi lika Jesu.
 

4.Balibonga bonke, Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Indumiso yonke,Igazi lika Jesu
 " "Yabasembu sweni,Ekujabuleni,
 " "Besho bonk "Amen" Igazi lika Jesu

1.Zanini zizwe,bo
 " "Sivumelane sonke
 " "Sizomdumis'uMntwana
 " "NguJesu oyiNkosi

 Chorus
 " "Bayethe Nkos' EnguNgqongqoshe
 " "Bayethe Nkos' Emiyo njalo
 " "Bayethe Nkos' Esimakade
 " "Usomandla

 2.Vumani zizwe bo
 " "Guqani ,hloniphani
 " "Thomani,khothamani
 " "Vumani-yon' iNkosi
 
 3. Bongani zizwe,bo
 " "Umhlaba mawudume,
 " "Thusani,babazani
 " "Bongan' uJesu iNkosi
 4. Thelani zizwe,bo
 " "Ningabogodhla lutho
 " "Nizinikele kuye
 " "Bhekani nans' iNkosi

1.Ndinoshamiswa kwazvo
 " "Namabasa makuru
 " "Akaitiwa nemi
 " "Ose anorumbidza
 " "Ukuru hwenyu Mwari
 " "Hunoshamisa kwazvo


2.Kana ndorangarira
 " "Mabasa okudenga
 " "Kana ndarangarira
 " "Mabasa epanyika
 " "Inobuda misodzi
 " "Kana ndofunga imi


3.Mwari vatatu mumwe
 " "Itai kuti tikudei
 " "Nokuti makatida
 " "Makazotipa Jesu
 " "Matipa mweya wenyu
 " "Wokutisimbaradza


4.Rumbidza iwe denga
 " "Rumbidza iwe nyika
 " "Rumbidza iwe gungwa
 " "Nesu ngatirumbidze
 " "Uyu musiki wedu
 " "Ano rudo rukuru

1. 'Sikhathi somkhuleko.
 " "Ligugu lamakholwa
 " "Kulapho ,bazalwane
 " "Amandla ayatholwa
 " "Nxa sisemthandazweni,
 " "'Sivul' izinhliziyo
 " "Sibike kuy' Inkosi
 " "Silungiselwe yiyo

 2.'Sikhathi somkhuleko
 " "Masingakhohlwa sona
 " "Sizodangal' impela
 " "Singekunq'ob' ukona
 " "Asinamandhla neze
 " "Sibindi singebekho
 " "Singasigcini kahle
 " "Sikhathi somkhuleko

 3. Sikhathi somkhuleko
 " "Siyakunjuzwa ngaso
 " "NguMoya oyingcwele
 " "Ongumhloleli waso,
 " "Usifundisa futhi
 " "Ukukhuleka njalo
 " "Sibike konke, konke
 " "Singabi namithwalo

 4.'Sikhathi somkhuleko
 " "Abanye abanaso
 " "Ngakho bahamba kabi
 " "Basindwa inkathazo
 " "Masingabi'ziwula
 " "Siqedwa inhlupheko
 " "Ngokuba siyakhohlwa
 " "Sithathi somkhuleko

1.NgoMsindis'onami la emphini
 " "Ngiyagcinwa noma kungathini
 " "Ungisith'esivunguvungwini
 " "Esandleni somusa

 Chorus
 " "Esandleni somusa
 " "Esandieni somuse
 " "Ngiyagcinwa.noma kungathin
 " "Esandieni somusa

 2.Ungigona ngemikhono yakhe,
 " "Ngiyathokozisw, amazin akhe
 " "Ngiyalondwa ngobugawe bakhe
 " "Esandieni somusa

 3. Yena akasoze anglyske
 " "Ngingephucwe fulhi kuyengeks
 " "Ngoba ungiphethe ngesinske
 " "Esandieni somusa

I will sing of the mercies of the
 Lord forever
 I will sing, I will sing
 I will sing of the mercies of the
 Lord forever
 I will sing for the mercies of the Lord
 With my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness, thy faithfulness,
 With my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations
 I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
 I will sing, I will sing
 I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
 I will sing for the mercies of the Lord

1.I am weak but thou art strong
 " "Jesus keep me from all wrong
 " "I'll will be satisfied as long, as I walk
 " "Let me walk close to you
 

Chorus
 " "Just a closer walk with thee
 " "Grant it, Jesus is my plea 
 " "Daily walking closer to thee
 " "Let it be,Dear Lord, let it be
 

2. Thus this world of toil and snares
 " "If I falter,Lord, who cares
 " "Who with me my burden shares
 " "None but thee,dera Lord, none but thee
 

3. When my feeble life is over
 " "Time for me will be no more
 " "Guide me gently,safety o\er
 " "To thy kingdom shore,to thy kingdom shore.

1.Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness
 " "Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve
 " "Waiting for the harvest and the time of reaping 
 " "We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves
 

Chorus
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 " "We shall come rejoicing
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 " "We shall come rejoicing
 " "Bringing in the sheaves
 

2.Sowing in the sunshine
 " "Bowing in the shadows
 " "Fearing neither clouds
 " "Nor winters's chilling breeze
 " "By and by the harvest and the labour ended
 " "We shall come rejoicing
 " "Bringing in the sheaves

1.Jesus loves me this I know
 " "For the bible tels me so
 " "Little one to him belong
 " "They are weak but he is strong
 

Chorus
 " "Yes Jesus loves me
 " "Yes Jesus loves me 
 " "Yes Jesus loves me
 " "For the bible tells me so
 

2.Jesus loves me. He who died
 " "Heaven's gate to open wide
 " "He will wash away my sins
 " "Let His little child come in
 

3. Jesus loves me. Loves me still
 " "Though I am weak and ill
 " "From his shining throne on high
 " "Comes to watch me where I lie

1.I've wondered far way from God
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "The path of sin too long I've trod
 " "Lord I'm coming home
 

Chorus
 " "Coming home, coming home
 " "Nevermore to roam
 " "Open wide thine arms of love
 " "Lord I'm coming home



2.I've wasted many precious years
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "I now repent with bitter tears
 " "Lord I'm coming home
 



3.I'm tired of sin an straying Lord
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "I'll trust thy love believe thy word
 " "Lord I'm coming home
 

4.My soul is sick, my heart is soul
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "My strength renew, my hope restore
 " "Lord I'm coming home
 

5.My only hope, myonly plea
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "That Jesus died and died for me
 " "Lord I'm coming home
 

6.I need cleansing blood I know
 " "Now I am coming home
 " "O wash me wither than the snow
 " "Lord I'm coming home
Ninth Hymn
Tenth Hymn
Eleventh Hymn
Twelfth Hymn
